arguments.value: Click here when you believe you have completed the lesson.

arguments.value: Stage 1: The information displayed when an employee is choosen from the drop down menu is stored on the client side.
arguments.raw: Stage 1: The information displayed when an employee is choosen from the drop down menu is stored on the client side.

arguments.value: Stage 1: Use Firebug to find where the information is stored on the client side.
arguments.raw: Stage 1: Use Firebug to find where the information is stored on the client side.

arguments.value: Stage 1: Examine the hidden table to see if there is anyone listed who is not in the drop down menu.

arguments.value: Stage 1: Look in the last row of the hidden table.

arguments.value: Stage 1: You can access the server directly here to see what results are being returned

arguments.value: Stage 2: The server uses an XPath query agasinst an XML database.

arguments.value: Stage 2: The query currently returns all of the contents of the database.
arguments.raw: Stage 2: The query currently returns all of the contents of the database.

arguments.value: Stage 2: The query should only return the information of employees who are managed by Moe Stooge, whose userID is 102
arguments.raw: Stage 2: The query should only return the information of employees who are managed by Moe Stooge, whose userID is 102

arguments.value: Stage 2: Try using a filter operator.
arguments.raw: Stage 2: Try using a filter operator.

arguments.value: Stage 2: Your filter operator should look something like: [Managers/Manager/text()=
arguments.raw: Stage 2: Your filter operator should look something like: [Managers/Manager/text()=

right.value: STAGE 1:	You are Moe Stooge, CSO of Goat Hills Financial. You have access to everyone in the company's information, except the CEO, Neville Bartholomew.  Or at least you shouldn't have access to the CEO's information.  For this exercise, examine the contents of the page to see what extra information you can find.
right.raw: STAGE 1:	You are Moe Stooge, CSO of Goat Hills Financial. You have access to everyone in the company's information, except the CEO, Neville Bartholomew.  Or at least you shouldn't have access to the CEO's information.  For this exercise, examine the contents of the page to see what extra information you can find.

right.value: STAGE 2:	Now, fix the problem.  Modify the server to only return results that Moe Stooge is allowed to see.
right.raw: STAGE 2:	Now, fix the problem.  Modify the server to only return results that Moe Stooge is allowed to see.
